14 using namespace voxblox; // NOLINT

16 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
17  google::InitGoogleLogging(argv[0]);
18 
19  if (argc != 7) {
20  throw std::runtime_error(
21  std::string("Args: filename to load, filename to save to") +
22  ", min weight, min fixed distance" +
23  ", max esdf distance, default esdf distance");
24  }
25 
26  const std::string file = argv[1];
27  const FloatingPoint min_weight = std::stof(argv[3]);
28  const FloatingPoint min_distance_m = std::stof(argv[4]);
29  const FloatingPoint max_distance_m = std::stof(argv[5]);
30  const FloatingPoint default_distance_m = std::stof(argv[6]);
31 
32  Layer<TsdfVoxel>::Ptr layer_from_file;
33  io::LoadLayer<TsdfVoxel>(file, &layer_from_file);
34 
35  LOG(INFO) << "Layer memory size: " << layer_from_file->getMemorySize();
36  LOG(INFO) << "Layer voxel size: " << layer_from_file->voxel_size();
37  LOG(INFO) << "Layer voxels per side: "
38  << layer_from_file->voxels_per_side();
39 
40  // ESDF maps.
41  EsdfMap::Config esdf_config;
42  // Same number of voxels per side for ESDF as with TSDF
43  esdf_config.esdf_voxels_per_side = layer_from_file->voxels_per_side();
44  // Same voxel size for ESDF as with TSDF
45  esdf_config.esdf_voxel_size = layer_from_file->voxel_size();
46 
47  EsdfIntegrator::Config esdf_integrator_config;
48  esdf_integrator_config.min_weight = min_weight;
49  esdf_integrator_config.min_distance_m = min_distance_m;
50  esdf_integrator_config.max_distance_m = max_distance_m;
51  esdf_integrator_config.default_distance_m = default_distance_m;
52 
53  EsdfMap esdf_map(esdf_config);
54  EsdfIntegrator esdf_integrator(esdf_integrator_config, layer_from_file.get(),
55  esdf_map.getEsdfLayerPtr());
56 
57  esdf_integrator.updateFromTsdfLayerBatch();
58 
59  const bool esdf_success = io::SaveLayer(esdf_map.getEsdfLayer(), argv[2]);
60 
61  if (esdf_success == false) {
62  throw std::runtime_error("Failed to save ESDF");
63  }
64 
65  return 0;
66 }
